Hello!
I'm Yatagarasu but, please, call me Yata. And who might you be, young one?
It's been a while since I last ran into anyone in this place... What brings you here?
No response, blank expression, opaque eyes... I see. You don't remember much, do you, child? Still, I have no choice.
I'm searching for the Sun. Would you have seen it around here?
Yes, the Sun! I must find it... I can't leave the endless darkness of these galleries otherwise. Have you seen it?
N...No.
Thought as much.
Mine is a very important mission, you see? But I'm exhausted and had my left wing twisted at that last turn there... so I'm afraid I'm gonna need your help.
Take me with you and I will guide us both out of here. Sounds good, right?
Shall we?
You will realize, my dear, that we must always reach for the light. It's everywhere, but unless you search for it, you'll never find a single ray.
Search for... light.
I'm glad you understand. As you can see, the shadows here are hungry, avid for swallowing us. Should they succeed, you would return to nothingness and I would suffer the same fate.
Despite being together, we'd be worlds apart. No memory, no will, no purpose. Lost souls.
I have... a purpose... now. To find the Sun.
Yes, my dear! And I thank you very much for that. Even though that is my purpose, I'm certain you'll remember yours shortly.
Wait!!!
Can you see this floating dark mass ahead of us?
Never touch or get too close to this kind of creature, child. These are material manifestations of darkness, so high its concentration at these places.
Merely touching them will cause your warmth and your essence to be sucked out into the void. They are shortcuts to nothingness, to the loss of all we know and are.
I can't move.... is this... fear?
Oh, I'm sorry. It seems I've made you remember this rather uncomfortable feeling. But don't worry, my dear. This particular kind of shadow will not advance against us.
It just forces us to turn around and look for another viable path. For now, this is a dead end.
Besides, you are now able to light the darkness, right? Do your magic and clear the path, you've got what it takes.
What is this?... It's beautiful!
Is this what you're looking for? Don't mind me, go ahead.
I can see...
And what can you see, my dear?
Blue skies and green fields... the flowers and the animals, lively and nimble. I see the day and I see life.

Uhmm... that's interesting. These are things that disappeared a long time ago. It's the Sun, you see? Or used to be, at least. It allowed all these things to manifest or, as we used to say, to be born.
But it vanished, and that was so long ago that all we have left today are memories of this phenomenon we called life. Which leads me to believe you've found exactly that, a Memory Fragment.
Hey, did you notice you are, now, irradiating light? It's almost imperceptible, like an aura.
I know many spirits who share this property, but I had never seen it in a lost soul before. Moreover, your aura's color is rather uncommon and reminds me of an old friendship...
By the way, we need a name for you, at least until you remember yours... what about "Terasu"?
I like it!
Then it's decided, Terasu. This newfound, faint aura of yours will be of much use to us in here.
Do you think so?... I don't know, it's too weak to light the way...
Oh... I suppose, then, you haven't learned how to use it with the memories you collected.

I'll explain: it's only weak when dispersed around your body. If you try focusing it, however, you'll be able to produce a strong beam of light. Please, remember: focused light beams can dissipate even the densest shadows.
You seem to be puzzled by this contraption, aren't you, child?
Yes, I am. What could this be, Yata? I feel like I knew it once, but can no longer remember...
Not to worry, my dear. You'll recollect it all in due time.
This, here, is a Beacon. If we can manage to infuse the mechanism with enough luminous energy, it can make light rays travel further.

We are currently in a lit area of Amanoiwato, this immense cave. As you have already come to understand, in order for a spirit to withstand the corruption of darkness in here, it needs to constantly search for light.
However, there are areas of the cave where light is currently unable to reach. Delving into these pits is certain demise for us. By activating beacons, we can make these places traversable.
I see. I guess we will not be able to go very far unless we get a few beacons lit, right? Thank you, Yata. I'm glad you're here.
You're most welcome, child. I'm also glad for your assistance.
